author.description: List of names of authors of the cog

description.description: A long description of the cog or repo. For cogs, this is displayed when a user executes [p]cog info.

install_msg.description: The message that gets displayed when a cog is installed or a repo is added

short.description: A short description of the cog or repo. For cogs, this info is displayed when a user executes [p]cog list

author: John Doe

data.description: This is a long description of the cog or repo. It can contain multiple lines of text and is displayed when a user executes [p]cog info.
data.install_msg: The cog or repo has been successfully installed.
data.short: A short description of the cog or repo.
